net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

Class BaseServletContextResourceReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader.BaseServletContextResourceReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceBrowser, ResourceReader, ServletContextResourceReader, StreamResourceReader, TextResourceReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader

    public class BaseServletContextResourceReader
extends Object
implements ServletContextResourceReader
    This class defines the resource reader which is based on the servlet context
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi
